name: soulsolid
description: Soulsolid is a web server for managing your music library.

scripts.build:assets: npm run build:css && npm run copy:deps
scripts.copy:deps: cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js public/js/ && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/ext/class-tools.js public/js/ && cp node_modules/hyperscript.org/dist/_hyperscript.min.js public/js/ && cp node_modules/animate.css/animate.min.css public/css/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css public/fontawesome/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts public/fontawesome/ && cp node_modules/@iconify/iconify/dist/iconify.min.js public/js/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/js/
scripts.dev: npm run build:assets && npm run build:css:watch
